destinations.name: Dubai
destinations.description: A modern metropolis known for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture, and vibrant nightlife
destinations.longDescription: Dubai is a city and emirate in the United Arab Emirates known for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture and a lively nightlife scene. Burj Khalifa, an 830m-tall tower, dominates the skyscraper-filled skyline. At its foot lies Dubai Fountain, with jets and lights choreographed to music. On artificial islands just offshore is Atlantis, The Palm, a resort with water and marine-animal parks.
destinations.bestTimeToVisit: November to March for pleasant weather (20-30°C). Avoid summer months (May-September) when temperatures can exceed 45°C.
thingsToDo: Shop at Dubai Mall and traditional souks
localCustoms: Dress modestly in public areas (shoulders and knees covered)
Remove shoes before entering mosques and homes
Use right hand for eating and greeting
Public displays of affection are discouraged
Avoid alcohol consumption in public (only in licensed venues)
Always ask permission before photographing people, especially women
destinations.visaRequirements: Most nationalities receive free 30-90 day visa on arrival. US, UK, EU, Australia, Canada citizens get 90 days. Check with UAE embassy for your specific nationality. Passport must be valid for 6 months.
destinations.climate: Desert climate with very hot summers and warm winters. Rainfall is minimal (100mm/year) mainly in winter months. High humidity in coastal areas.
weatherWarnings: Extreme heat in summer (May-September) - temperatures can exceed 50°C
Sandstorms occasionally occur, especially in spring
High humidity near coast can make temperatures feel hotter
Minimal rainfall but occasional flash floods during winter storms
destinations.metaTitle: Dubai Tours & Activities - Book Dubai Experiences 2024
destinations.metaDescription: Discover top Dubai tours. Visit Burj Khalifa, desert safaris, dhow cruises. Best prices guaranteed. Book your Dubai adventure today!

categories.name: Adventure Tours
categories.description: Experience thrilling adventures and outdoor activities
categories.longDescription: Get your adrenaline pumping with our exciting adventure tours. From desert safaris to water sports, mountain climbing to zip-lining, we offer authentic adventure experiences led by expert guides. Perfect for thrill-seekers and outdoor enthusiasts looking to push their boundaries and create unforgettable memories.
highlights: Expert adventure guides with safety certifications
features: All necessary equipment and gear included
categories.metaDescription: Book exciting adventure tours. Desert safaris, water sports, expeditions. Expert guides, top safety standards. Start your adventure today!

tours.title: Dubai City Explorer - Complete Experience
tours.description: Discover the best of Dubai in one unforgettable day. Visit iconic landmarks and experience modern luxury.
tours.longDescription: Experience the ultimate Dubai adventure with our comprehensive city tour. From the towering Burj Khalifa to the traditional souks, explore everything this magnificent city has to offer. Our expert guides will take you through the modern marvels and historical treasures that make Dubai unique.
highlights: Explore Dubai Mall and Dubai Fountain
Traditional Abra boat ride across Dubai Creek
Walk through Gold and Spice Souks
Photo stop at Atlantis The Palm
whatsIncluded: Hotel pickup and drop-off in Dubai
tours.meetingPoint: Hotel lobby pickup (Dubai hotels only) or Dubai Mall main entrance
tours.ageRestriction: All ages welcome. Children under 12 must be accompanied by an adult.
tours.cancellationPolicy: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the tour start time. 50% refund for cancellations within 12-24 hours. No refund for cancellations within 12 hours.
whatToWear: Modest attire for mosque visits (shoulders and knees covered)
Sun hat or cap for outdoor activities
tours.physicalRequirements: Moderate walking required (approximately 2-3km total). Tour involves stairs, some uneven surfaces, and standing periods. Please inform us of any mobility concerns in advance.
accessibilityInfo: Wheelchair accessible with advance notice (48 hours)
Audio guides available for hearing impaired
Please contact us for specific accessibility requirements
tours.transportationDetails: Luxury air-conditioned vehicle (minivan or coach depending on group size). Hotel pickup starts 30 minutes before tour time. Return to hotel or Dubai Mall (your choice).
tours.mealInfo: Lunch not included. We'll stop at Dubai Mall Food Court where you can choose from 200+ restaurants (own expense). Vegetarian, halal, and vegan options widely available.
tours.weatherPolicy: Tours operate year-round. In case of extreme weather (rare), tours may be rescheduled or refunded at your choice. Indoor activities prioritized during peak summer heat.
tours.photoPolicy: Photography encouraged throughout the tour. Professional photographers available at Burj Khalifa (optional purchase). Flash photography prohibited in museums. Respect privacy of locals.
tours.tipPolicy: Gratuities not included but appreciated for excellent service. Standard tipping: 10-15 AED per person for guide, 5-10 AED for driver.
healthSafety: Enhanced sanitization protocols on all vehicles
First aid trained guides with emergency kits
Small group sizes for social comfort
culturalInfo: Learn about Dubai's transformation from fishing village to global city
Understand Islamic architecture and cultural traditions
Discover Emirati heritage and local customs
Experience blend of modern luxury and traditional values
Insights into Dubai's role as global business hub
tours.seasonalVariations: Best visited October-April (cooler weather 20-30°C). Summer months (May-September) can be extremely hot (40-50°C) but all venues are air-conditioned. Ramadan requires adjusted schedules.
localCustoms: Arrive at pickup point 10 minutes early
Dress modestly when visiting cultural sites
Respect prayer times (tour may pause briefly)
Public displays of affection should be minimal
Stay hydrated - guide will provide water breaks
tours.metaTitle: Dubai City Tour - Burj Khalifa & Top Attractions | Book Now
tours.metaDescription: Explore Dubai's iconic landmarks including Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, Gold Souk & more. 8-hour guided tour with hotel pickup. Book your Dubai adventure today!

itinerary.title: Hotel Pickup
itinerary.description: Your professional guide will pick you up from your Dubai hotel in a comfortable, air-conditioned vehicle. Meet your fellow travelers and receive a brief overview of the exciting day ahead.

itinerary.title: Burj Khalifa Observation Deck
itinerary.description: Ascend to the 124th floor observation deck of the world's tallest building. Enjoy breathtaking 360-degree views of Dubai's skyline, desert, and ocean. Learn about the tower's incredible engineering.

itinerary.title: Dubai Mall & Fountain Show
itinerary.description: Explore the world's largest shopping mall. Visit the Dubai Aquarium, see the dancing fountains, and enjoy free time for shopping or refreshments.

itinerary.title: Lunch Break
itinerary.description: Free time for lunch at Dubai Mall's extensive Food Court or nearby restaurants. Your guide will provide recommendations for every budget and dietary preference.

itinerary.title: Dubai Creek & Abra Boat Ride
itinerary.description: Experience traditional Dubai with an authentic abra (wooden boat) ride across Dubai Creek. See the historic waterway that made Dubai a trading hub.

itinerary.title: Gold & Spice Souks
itinerary.description: Wander through the bustling traditional markets. See dazzling gold jewelry displays and aromatic spice stalls. Learn bargaining tips and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere.

itinerary.title: Atlantis The Palm Photo Stop
itinerary.description: Visit the iconic Palm Jumeirah and stop for photos at the magnificent Atlantis hotel. Capture the engineering marvel of the palm-shaped island.

itinerary.title: Return to Hotel
itinerary.description: Relax on the comfortable journey back to your hotel or request drop-off at Dubai Mall. Your guide will answer any final questions and provide recommendations for the rest of your stay.

faqs.question: What time does the tour start?
faqs.answer: Hotel pickup begins at 8:00 AM. Please be ready in your hotel lobby 10 minutes early. The exact pickup time may vary by 15 minutes depending on your hotel location.

faqs.question: Is lunch included in the tour price?
faqs.answer: Lunch is not included to give you flexibility in choosing your preferred dining option. Dubai Mall has over 200 restaurants with options from budget-friendly to fine dining, including vegetarian, halal, and vegan choices.

faqs.question: Can I skip certain stops if I've already visited them?
faqs.answer: While the tour follows a set itinerary, we can often accommodate requests to skip certain attractions. Please inform your guide at the start of the tour, and they'll adjust the timing to allow more free time elsewhere.

faqs.question: What is the dress code?
faqs.answer: Casual, modest clothing is recommended. When visiting mosques or traditional areas, shoulders and knees should be covered. Comfortable walking shoes are essential. Dubai can be very hot, so light, breathable fabrics are best.

faqs.question: Is the tour suitable for elderly or disabled travelers?
faqs.answer: Yes, the tour is generally accessible. Most venues have wheelchair access and elevators. Please inform us of any specific requirements when booking so we can ensure appropriate arrangements.

bookingOptions.label: Standard City Explorer
bookingOptions.description: Complete Dubai city tour with all major attractions, professional guide, and comfortable transport

bookingOptions.label: VIP Premium Experience
bookingOptions.description: Enhanced experience with luxury transport, private guide option, and Burj Khalifa 148th floor Sky Lounge access

addOns.name: Desert Safari Add-on
addOns.description: Extend your day with an evening desert safari including dune bashing, camel ride, BBQ dinner, and live entertainment

addOns.name: Professional Photography Package
addOns.description: Personal photographer for the entire tour with 100+ edited photos delivered within 48 hours

addOns.name: Luxury Lunch at Armani Hotel
addOns.description: 3-course lunch at Armani/Ristorante in Burj Khalifa with stunning views

addOns.name: Private Car Upgrade
addOns.description: Upgrade to private luxury vehicle (up to 4 people) instead of shared group transport
